ValidationRule.description: Weight and Rating Should be filled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$RecordType.Name != 'GTO FSE VOC' && ( OR(and (isblank(Delivery_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Delivery_Customer_Rating__c,'') )), AND(Not(isblank(Delivery_Weight__c )),ispickval(Delivery_Customer_Rating__c,'')) ) && AND(isblank(Delivery_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Delivery_Customer_Rating__c,'Unspecified')) ||
OR(and (isblank(Quality_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Quality_Customer_Rating__c,'') )), AND(Not(isblank(Quality_Weight__c )),ispickval(Quality_Customer_Rating__c,'')) ) && AND(isblank(Quality_Weight__c), not ( ispickval(Quality_Customer_Rating__c,'Unspecified')) ||
OR(and (isblank(Reliability_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Reliability_Customer_Rating__c,'') )), AND(Not(isblank(Reliability_Weight__c )),ispickval(Reliability_Customer_Rating__c,'')) ) && AND(isblank(Reliability_Weight__c), not ( ispickval(Reliability_Customer_Rating__c,'Unspecified'))
||
OR(and (isblank(Responsiveness_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Responsiveness_Customer_Rating__c,'') )), AND(Not(isblank(Responsiveness_Weight__c )),ispickval(Responsiveness_Customer_Rating__c,'')) ) && AND(isblank(Responsiveness_Weight__c), not ( ispickval(Responsiveness_Customer_Rating__c,'Unspecified')) ||
OR(and (isblank(Value_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Value_Customer_Rating__c,'') )), AND(Not(isblank(Value_Weight__c )),ispickval(Value_Customer_Rating__c,'')) ) && AND(isblank(Value_Weight__c), not ( ispickval(Value_Customer_Rating__c,'Unspecified'))
||
OR(and (isblank(Development_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Development_Customer_Rating__c,'') )), AND(Not(isblank(Development_Weight__c )),ispickval(Development_Customer_Rating__c,'')) ) && AND(isblank(Development_Weight__c), not ( ispickval(Development_Customer_Rating__c,'Unspecified'))
||
OR(and (isblank(Service_Support_Weight__c ), not ( ispickval(Service_Support_Customer_Rating__c,'') )), AND(Not(isblank(Service_Support_Weight__c )),ispickval(Service_Support_Customer_Rating__c,'')) ) && AND(isblank(Service_Support_Weight__c), not ( ispickval(Service_Support_Customer_Rating__c,'Unspecified'))
))))))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Weight and Rating Should be filled
